heading: HR00911
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE(S) TO IMMEDIATELY INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE SUDDEN INCREASE IN MERALCO ELECTRICITY RATES AND BILLS, WITH THE END IN VIEW THAT CORRECTIVE MEASURES BE IMPLEMENTED TO ENSURE THAT CONSUMERS ARE CHARGED BASED ON THEIR ACTUAL ELECTRICITY CONSUMPTION
principal-authors: DUTERTE, PAOLO Z.; YAP, ERIC G.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-05-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00911
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE(S) TO IMMEDIATELY INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE SUDDEN INCREASE IN MERALCO ELECTRICITY RATES AND BILLS, WITH THE END IN VIEW THAT CORRECTIVE MEASURES BE IMPLEMENTED TO ENSURE THAT CONSUMERS ARE CHARGED BASED ON THEIR ACTUAL ELECTRICITY CONSUMPTION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DUTERTE, PAOLO Z., YAP, ERIC G.
DATE FILED : 2020-05-27
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2020-05-28
